name: 陳怡倩
objective: 本課程介紹心理學理論，並探討如何應用心理學於英語教學，以提昇學生學習動機和自我學習、自我反思能力。
schedule:
1　　9/17　　Course Introduction
2　　9/24　　Mid-Autumn Festival Holidays (No Class)
3　　10/1　　Class Management & Lesson Planning
4　　10/8　　Language Acquisition: Behaviorist Theory
5　　10/15　　BT Lesson Plan Presentations
6　　10/22　　BT Lesson Plan Presentations cont.
7　　10/29　　Language Acquisition: Cognition Theory
8　　11/5　　CT Lesson Plan Presentations
9　　11/12　　CT Lesson Plan Presentations cont.
10　　11/19　　Language Acquisition: Constructivist Theory
11　　11/26　　CtT Lesson Plan Presentations
12　　12/3　　CtT Lesson Plan Presentations cont.
13　　12/10　　Types of Learning　　Brown (pp.91-98)
14　　12/17　　Motivation I　　Williams (pp.111-120)
15　　12/24　　Motivation II　　Williams (pp.120-131)
16　　12/31　　Motivation III　　Williams (pp.131-142)
17　　1/7　　Observation Journal Presentations
18　　1/14　　Observation Journal Presentations cont.
scorePolicy: Attendance & Participation (15%); Group Topic Presentation (10%); Observation Journal & Presentation (20%); Lesson Plan Development & Presentation (15%); In-Class & Take-Home Reflections (40%).
materials:
Required Readings:
1. Brown, H. Douglas. (2000). Principles of language learning and teaching (4th). White Plain, NY: Addison Wesley Longman.
2. Harmer, Jeremy. (1998). How to teach English. White Plain, NY: Addison Wesley Longman.
3. Williams, Marion, & Burden, Robert L. (1997). Psychology for language teachers: A social constructivist approach. Cambridge, UK: Cambridge University Press.
Suggested Readings:
1. Gredler, Margaret E. (2004). Learning and instruction: Theory into practice (5th). Upper Saddle River, NJ: Merrill.
2. Peregoy, Suzanne F., & Boyle, Owen F. (1997). Reading, writing, & learning in ESL: A resource book for k-12 teachers (2nd). New York, NY: Longman.
